snippet: Criticism by Greg Smith, a largely anonymous 33-year-old midlevel executive who resigned Wednesday, sent ripple effects through Wall Street.
abstract: Criticism by Greg Smith, a largely anonymous 33-year-old midlevel executive who resigned Wednesday, sent ripple effects through Wall Street.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and LANDON THOMAS JR

headline.main: Public Rebuke of Culture at Goldman Opens Debate
headline.print_headline: Public Rebuke of Culture At Goldman Opens Debate
